properties.name: Lin Xiu
properties.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)
properties.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand

relationships.name: Su Mingyue
relationships.type: Debt relationship (Lin Xiu owes Su Mingyue a huge medical bill)

relationships.name: Chen Xiaodao
relationships.type: Exploitative relationship (Lin Xiu knows Chen Xiaodao's true identity)

events.details: While conducting his nightly rounds, Chen spots Su Mingyue and Lin Xiu entering normally restricted areas separately, both appearing suspicious
consequences: Notices the electronic malfunctions coincide with their presence

events.details: Chen uses the service elevator's blind spots to observe Lin Xiu tampering with electronic panels, causing brief power surges
consequences: Confirms Lin Xiu's involvement in the malfunctions
Strengthens his desire to protect Su Mingyue

events.details: Following power fluctuations, Chen discovers both Su Mingyue and Lin Xiu in the lower deck storage area, surrounded by strange electronic equipment that appears decades more advanced than the ship's technology
consequences: Reveals the malfunctions are intentional and connected to the ship's disappearance
Chen must choose between reporting them or investigating further
